ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice...so it s only 1 random non bagged object that you re not wearing...didn t know that now do I lose exp when this happens? being pked that is? oh and can a
ygData.messageBody:
Nice...so it's only 1 random non bagged object that you're not
wearing...didn't know that


now do I lose exp when this happens? being pked that is?

oh and can a bag with nothing in it be taken?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2001 3:35 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
>
>
> Yep...it sure is easy to build up trust. Just make friends, just like you
> would elsewhere. Pkers generally don't try to make friends and hang out
> w/
> you. They just rush up when you're weak or obviously much lower level
> than
> you.
>
> They can't get anything in bags.
>
> They can take things you are wearing, but it's only 1 random item..so if
> you don't want to lose something cool, bag it b4 u die.
>
> Guards will protect you if you're right next to them, but don't attack.
> Let them hit you, and the guard will step in. However, they won't do
> anything about you getting casted on or shot w/ a bow from a distance.
>
>
